channel.title: Throwing knife
channel.description: I kinda think i rushed this... but anyway here it is: [img]http://img704.imageshack.us/img704/299/throwingknife.png[/img] [img]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/8320/tknifewield.png[/img]

item.title: Throwing knife
item.dc:creator: @Massive0wn3r Massive0wn3r
item.description:
@Massive0wn3r wrote:

WEll, i think its pretty nice, but first off they hold it by the blade, u can see that on last mission. other than that nice 8/10 =)

Read full topic

item.title: Throwing knife
item.dc:creator: @V1LL3 V1LL3
item.description:
@V1LL3 wrote:

Its a kunai, right ?

You hold a Kunai in the handle, not the ring.

You throw it using your wrist, so you throw better holding the handle. Irl.

You should fix that, otherwise its good.

Read full topic

item.title: Throwing knife
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:11, topic:320794”][quote author=licorish55 link=topic=417258.msg3068053#msg3068053 date=1261353686]
I don’t understand the point of the ring at the end of the handle?
[/quote]
The ‘ring’ is to balance the throwing knife and center the rotation point. the model is VERY choppy and inaccurate. try smoothing the edges cuz they seem a little too randomised for me[/quote]
it’s probably because i rushed it :
but anyway…i added a ingame pic and
resized it.

Read full topic

item.title: Throwing knife
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

licorish55:

I don’t understand the point of the ring at the end of the handle?

The ‘ring’ is to balance the throwing knife and center the rotation point. the model is VERY choppy and inaccurate. try smoothing the edges cuz they seem a little too randomised for me

Read full topic

item.title: Throwing knife
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:9, topic:320794”][quote author=Mr Mopar link=topic=417258.msg3068474#msg3068474 date=1261368766]

its nice, i was gonna say the handle is too flat but i see now in the pic that its based on its also skinny as the blade is. so yea its good. but traced i give 9/10, GJ!
[/quote][quote author=lord dharok link=topic=417258.msg3068427#msg3068427 date=1261366589]
sweet but try to make it a little bit smaller and thinner not so fat i guess just my suggestion other then that a 9/10 cupcakes for u

Ty
also chopstickz,i find tracing ALOT easier.
[/quote]

Its only because you don’t know how to manipulate primitives like some. Once your try/learn primitives, you would like them allot better because of the time saved.[/quote]And the fact that they don’t look flat and uneven when your finished.

Read full topic

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:8, topic:320794”][quote author=chopstickz link=topic=417258.msg3068315#msg3068315 date=1261362602]
its nice, i was gonna say the handle is too flat but i see now in the pic that its based on its also skinny as the blade is. so yea its good. but traced i give 9/10, GJ!
[/quote][quote author=lord dharok link=topic=417258.msg3068427#msg3068427 date=1261366589]
sweet but try to make it a little bit smaller and thinner not so fat i guess just my suggestion other then that a 9/10 cupcakes for u
[/quote]
Ty
also chopstickz,i find tracing ALOT easier.[/quote]

Its only because you don’t know how to manipulate primitives like some. Once your try/learn primitives, you would like them allot better because of the time saved.
